Stone Bird

miscellaneous (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 286
weap id [weapon]: 176 (Stone Bird)
damage [dmg]: 9
defence [def]: +2
length [len]: 5
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 4
 
(Intrinsic Weapon [bonus], Bludgeoning Damage [blunt], More likely to hit head, Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5E5A to forge (E1A1)

This bird will float constantly above its owner until the owner attacks someone. The Stone Bird will then attack the same target with incredible speed by crashing into the target's head repeatedly. The bird is made out of magical stone and can float in the air without unfolding its wings.
